title: James Galway Program 7
brief_description: James Galway introduces saxophone quartet, “The Fairer Sax” (Anne Louise Lane, Gabrielle Lane, Karen Street and Julia Mills), to perform “Arrival of the Queen of Sheba” by Handel, “Andante and Scherzo” by Bozza, “Air on a G String” by Bach, “Rondo Cappiccioso” by Mendelsohn,
